EmailTemplate.name: 201912_EMEAI_Connectivity_CA.201912_EMEAI_Email_Connectivity_CA
EmailTemplate.subject: Tailor-made connectivity. A modern aircraft miracle.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/tailored-to-your-needs?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_emeai_bga_connectivity_ca]]> Tailor-made connectivity. A modern miracle.
Dear Customer,
Did you know we are helping to improve our customers entire flight operation through tailor-made inflight connectivity?
We are now offering a variety of airtime packages that are setting new standards, as well as providing customers with hardware, software and services that power home equivalent WiFi whenever and wherever you fly.
Through a suite of innovative services and tools that deliver unparalleled connectivity, user control and a secure global network we can keep you connected wherever you fly. Connect with an expert today to learn how Honeywell can connect you to the things that matter most.
Stay Connected Â <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/tailored-to-your-needs?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_emeai_bga_connectivity_ca]]>
